releaseNotes:
Ready for updates? In this version:
• Bug fixes and stability improvements

We love getting feedback from you! Please leave your reviews so we can keep making the app even better
description:
Meet AI Arta, your digital art studio, where you can become an artist with the power of AI. Need a digital avatar for your socials? Want to animate your photos? Looking for a unique tattoo design? Or curious about what your future baby might look like? AI Arta has you covered. Simply describe your idea or upload an image, and watch the magic happen. Join 15 million artists today. 

Designed for digital artists, hobbyists, and creatives of all kinds, here’s what you can create with AI Arta: 

► AI AVATARS & SELFIES 
Turn your selfies into stunning digital portraits. Our AI photo generator lets you experiment with different styles, eras, and characters. So you can become a fearless superhero, a futuristic cyborg, or a magical elf. With digital art tools, you can customize your AI avatar for a look that’s uniquely yours.

► AI VIDEO 
Create AI-driven videos in just a few taps. Want epic fights, animated photos, or custom scenes? Let your imagination run wild, and our AI video generator will bring it to life, turning moments into digital art. 

► TATTOO DESIGNS 
Thinking of getting a tattoo? Our AI-driven tattoo maker will create a custom design tailored to your preferences. Find the perfect ink inspiration, from minimalistic line art to intricate, bold designs—all with one AI image generator at hand. 

► AI REPLACE
Want to swap out unwanted elements or update your look? With AI Replace, just select the area you want to change and replace anything, from hairstyles to outfits or even backgrounds. Plus, you can easily refine your selection with a simple touch. It’s the perfect tool to make your photos exactly how you imagine them. 

► TEXT-TO-ART 
Turn words into visually stunning, high-quality digital artwork. Want to picture a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? AI Arta brings your wildest ideas to life. Choose from a variety of styles (fashion, retro comics, and more) and our AI image generator will create your images in seconds. 

► ART FROM IMAGE
Turn your sketches or photos into AI-generated art. Upload an image as a visual guide for your prompt, and let AI Arta, your AI art studio, refine, stylize, or completely transform it into a digital artwork. 

► AI BABY 
Curious about what your future baby might look like? AI Arta will unveil the mystery. Upload photos of you and your partner, and watch as our AI photo generator blends your facial features into a lifelike baby image.

Why AI Arta? 
Built on Stable Diffusion, Flux, and DALL·E, our AI image generator delivers fast, out-of-the box results. Trained on millions of images, it generates highly detailed, one-of-a-kind visuals from your prompts. Simply type in your concept or upload an image, and let AI Arta handle the rest. No experience needed. 

Try AI Arta for free and unlock premium features of this AI photo generator with a trial. 

You can enable a free trial to access the features included in the subscription.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION 
• You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features. 
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan. 

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: 
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/privacy 
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/terms
